column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient) $1$1$4$Started this generic form of Parnate because could no longer afford brand name (too expensive.  Approximately six months into taking this med I've experienced anger
column5: no feelings of happiness which I did feel prior to taking this med.  Depression became worse and trouble sleeping at night.  Blood sugar level would increase while on this medication.  Also experienced trouble speaking. Overall not good for me.

column2: 75 or over Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$5$2$It is the only anti-depressant I have tried that has given me back a good quality of life.  There are many precautions to be aware of while taking it.  I have taken this drug for 40 years.  The dose is the same now as when I began.
